timeline.body: As in https://github.com/jenkinsci/jenkins/blob/cc27faa48d8c5a0cf421a5d648231b506391c2eb/core/src/main/java/hudson/model/Label.java#L162 the URL is encoded automatically, so it does not matter if the label includes URL metacharacters.
timeline.bodyText:
As in 
  
    
      jenkins/core/src/main/java/hudson/model/Label.java
    
    
         Line 162
      in
      cc27faa
    
    
    
    

        
          
           return "label/" + Util.rawEncode(name) + '/'; 
        
    
  

 the URL is encoded automatically, so it does not matter if the label includes URL metacharacters.
timeline.bodyHTML:
As in

jenkins/core/src/main/java/hudson/model/Label.java

Line 162 in cc27faa

return "label/" + Util.rawEncode(name) + '/';
the URL is encoded automatically, so it does not matter if the label includes URL metacharacters.
timeline.author: jglick
